title: 9/19/17 - Patience and Complexity' (Duane Wilde, Tristan Harris & Bill O'Reilly join Glenn)
description:
Where is the real news? ....Male, female, non-binary?...California clears the way ...Hurricane Harvey relief volunteer Duane Wilde joins Glenn to discuss how to change things in your life for the good by serving others ...Nancy Pelosi gets shouted down (literally) on DACA ...Former Google design ethicist Tristan Harris (www.timewellspent.io) joins the show to discuss how good people get sucked into bad technology...Military action is coming to North Korea ...Bill O'Reilly joins the show, his new book 'Killing England' is out today.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
